keyMoments.title: Nami Uses Usopp's Clima-Tact
keyMoments.description: Nami fights using the weapon Usopp created for her, showing the crew's support for each other.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how the crew members help equip and strengthen each other for battles.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Claims Luffy is Dead
keyMoments.description: Crocodile tells Vivi that Luffy has died in their previous encounter.
keyMoments.significance: Creates fear that the crew's captain has been defeated.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Crocodile's True Goal Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals the entire Baroque Works operation was designed to find and acquire the ancient weapon Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Baroque Works was a front for acquiring an ancient weapon to challenge the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Miss Doublefinger Battles Nami
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works officer Miss Doublefinger fights Nami in the palace.
keyMoments.significance: One of the final battles between Baroque Works agents and the Straw Hats in Arabasta.

jollyRoger.description: A clown face with crossed bones
